name: Le Pipe
description:
Controls:
-WAD to move.
-Hold left click on the pipe to fix the pipe when broken.
-Click on buttons to buy/interact

You saw a seemingly strange pipe that was out of place. Its a mystery how it was there. As you see a constant stream of coins start to flow, you know what you do.

Explore the one pre-built level that doesn't change at all!
Find rare ores, upgrade the pipe and be the richest one in the world.
Find artifacts as you explore deeper into the game.

Credits:
Everything but music is original. Here are the links to the sound files:
"Continue?" by HeatleyBros - Calm Chill Game Music
